PURPOSE:  In this file, programmatically generate code that prints a separate chunk for each name in a list of names to
console and then to qmd file 
```{r create_qmd}
name <- "jim"
library(knitr)
# write to console
writeLines(c("---\n", 
             "title: generated by R",
             "---\n", 
             "```{r}", 
             "print(name)", 
             "paste0('print(', eval(name), ')')",
             "```"))

# write to file
writeLines(c("```{r}", "y + 1", "```"), "test.qmd")

# clean up
```{r }
file.remove("test.Rmd")
file.remove("test.md")
```
